Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package keda for versions less than 2.14.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package keda for versions less than 2.14.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package keda is earlier than 2.14.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-35255
